description: Multimedia Projector with a specification of 2 units of R9023429 part number, and NSCM/NCAGE 0NHJ7.The Crown retains the rights to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement for a period of 31st of March,2023.

full_summary:
=====================================================

### Tender Notice: Multimedia Projector

**Reference Number:** PW-22-01010013
**Solicitation Number:** W8485-226899
**Publication Date:** 2022-10-14
**Tender Closing Date:** 2022-11-01T14:00:00

**Procurement Details:**

The Department of National Defence is seeking to acquire a multimedia projector through a competitive open bidding process.

**Project Overview:**

The procurement involves the delivery of two (2) multimedia projectors to the Department of National Defence, 25 CFSD Montreal, 6363 Rue Notre, Dame St E., Montreal, QC, Canada, H1N 3V9, by no later than 31 March 2023.

**Specifications:**

* GSIN: N6730
* NSN: 6730-20-A0X-2684
* PROJECTOR MULTIMEDIA
* Part No.: R9023429
* NSCM/NCAGE: 0NHJ7
* Quantity: 2
* Unit of Issue: ea

**Bidding Requirements:**

Proposers must indicate the part number and NSCM/CAGE of the equivalent or substitute product they are offering. A Certificate of Conformance from the OEM is also required.

**Additional Information:**

* The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

### Contact Information:

Diego Vacca, Contract Officer
diego.vacca@forces.gc.ca

### Attachments:

Refer to the following attachments for further information:

* [W8485-226899_amd1.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/21/170afd370276a94e6c9e6ed8c316fe9e/w8485-226899_amd1.pdf)
* [W8485-226899_en.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/14/b8816162d57046289a3843a81cbe301e/w8485-226899_en.pdf)

[English version on the same page]
**Número de Référence** : PW-22-01010013
